name: Red-Eyes XYZ Dragoon
text: 2 Level 7 DARK Omni monsters. You can also Xyz Summon this card by using 1 DARK Rank 7 Xyz Monster you control as material (transfer its materials to this card). Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; send 1 DARK Omni monster or 1 Level 7 or lower DARK monster from your hand or Deck to the GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it, and if you do, this card gains ATK equal to the sent monster’s original ATK until the end of the turn. If this card has an Omni monster as material, it gains these effects: Once per turn: When your opponent activates a card or effect, you can send 1 DARK Omni monster from your hand, field, or Deck to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. If this card battles an opponent’s monster: Damage calculation is doubled, and this card inflicts piercing battle damage. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Level 7 DARK Omni monster from your GY, then attach this card to it as an Equip Spell that gives it 1000 ATK and the ability to negate 1 card effect once per turn. You can only use each effect of "Red-Eyes XYZ Dragoon" once per turn.
